prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Thank You for returning my soul to me with compassion — great is Your faithfulness.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 37:5: "Commit your way to the Lord; trust in Him and He will act."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 13:11: "Wealth gained hastily will dwindle, but whoever gathers little by little will increase it."
prayer.intention: Give me courage to take the risks You've called me to take.
prayer.closing: The Lord goes before you today. He will be with you; He will never leave you nor forsake you. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged.

weather.title: ☀️ Weather — Temecula, CA
weather.summary: Slight chance of showers early evening, then clearing. Sunny day ahead with a high of 67°F. Cool overnight at 41°F.

mre.title: 📊 MRE Trading

outliers.status: BEAR regime in BULL market — tech weakness

prediction_markets.kalshi: S&P 500 expected ~6,960 at close (NEUTRAL, 96.6% historical accuracy)
prediction_markets.polymarket: BEARISH signal — top event: 'Who will Trump nominate as Fed Chair?' ($443M volume)

mre.breadth: NEUTRAL, 5d trend EXPANDING (7/11 sectors advancing). RSP outperforming SPY by 1.86%.
mre.thesis: Neutral sentiment (48.6), early bull regime. No fear-level buy signals triggered. Gold and energy leading. Tech lagging — XLK in bear territory. Breadth expanding is positive. Stay patient, wait for fear dips to deploy.

family.title: 👨‍👩‍👦‍👦 Family Focus
recommendations: PRIORITY: Focus on repair. Acknowledge recent conflicts without defending.
Increase acts of service dramatically this week.
Create space for her to express frustrations without fixing.
upcoming_dates: 💝 Valentine's Day is THIS SATURDAY (Feb 14) — 4 days out. Plan something meaningful.
family.jones: 2 years, 8 months — loves Super Wings and Blaze

items.headline: Israel's security cabinet approves measures to deepen administrative control over West Bank, transferring governance functions from military to civilian authority
items.context: Part of broader sovereignty strategy; Palestinians characterize it as de facto annexation. 5 West Bank Palestinians indicted for terror cell planning.

items.headline: Report: Netanyahu received intelligence of Hamas invasion plans as early as 2018
items.context: New findings from ongoing Oct 7 commission of inquiry. Raises questions about pre-attack intelligence failures.

items.headline: Tax refunds set to increase 18% this season (~$65B more) thanks to One Big Beautiful Bill provisions
items.context: Higher SALT cap, no tax on overtime/tips, larger senior standard deduction. Tangible benefit hitting wallets now.

items.headline: Trump administration signs trade deal with Bangladesh — tariffs reduced from 37% to 19%
items.context: Bilateral deal approach continues. Bangladesh gets relief; US maintains leverage for future negotiations.

items.headline: Dr. Oz vows no barriers to measles vaccine access amid ongoing outbreaks
items.context: 733 cases tracked, vaccinations up 162% in outbreak epicenters. Public health response working — Spartanburg County leading vaccination surge.

items.headline: Epstein files: Lawmakers begin reviewing unredacted documents
items.context: Bipartisan interest in full disclosure. More details expected this week.

items.headline: Munich Security Conference report warns Europe must strengthen its own defense posture
items.context: US NATO Ambassador Whitaker pushes back: 'We're not trying to dismantle NATO.' European allies being pushed toward burden-sharing — a long-standing US goal across administrations.

items.headline: Big Tech AI spending hits $650B combined for 2026
items.context: Google, Microsoft, Meta, Amazon all-in. Alphabet alone: $175-185B capex this year. The infrastructure buildout is real.

items.headline: Alphabet capex doubling in 2026 — $175-185B range
items.context: Cloud + AI compute expansion. This is the picks-and-shovels play materializing at unprecedented scale.

items.headline: Infineon joins AI funding rush with euro debt offering
items.context: European chipmaker raising capital for AI projects. The AI supply chain is going global.

items.headline: Langfuse joins ClickHouse, ships Claude Code integration
items.context: Observability tool for LLM apps. Relevant for our stack — worth exploring.
